content: *a few weeks ago i made these lovely granny square cushions from this fab self striping yarn that i got for my birthday this is a really quick and easy method of making effective granny square cushions so with granny square day coming up next month i thought i would put together an easy tutorial whilst i made them * pattern in uk terminology hook - 5 5mm cushion insert required i used aran weight yarn in self striping but any yarn will do for this project
